com.b07.f19.e3

Interface Course

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingleLectureCourse

    public interface Course
    This is an interface of a basic course, and the necessary methods within.
    Author:
    Joe

        Method for setting or changing the name of a course

      • getCourseName

        java.lang.String getCourseName()

        the name of the course

      • setCourseCode

        void setCourseCode(java.lang.String code)
        Method for setting the course code
        Parameters:
        code - a string representing the course code, must be in format AAAA##, if not, code will not be set

      • getCourseCode

        java.lang.String getCourseCode()
        Method for returning the course code
        Returns:
        the current course code. Must be in format AAAA##

      • setExcludedCourse

        void setExcludedCourse(Course exclusion)
        Add a single course to the excluded course list
        Parameters:
        exclusion - the course to be excluded

      • setExcludedCourse

        void setExcludedCourse(java.util.ArrayList<Course> courses)
        Add a set of courses to the exclusion list.
        Parameters:
        courses - an array of courses to be added

      • getExclusionList

        java.util.ArrayList<Course> getExclusionList()
        method for returning the exclusion list for a given course
        Returns:
        the exclusion list for the course

      • setCourseDay

        void setCourseDay(CourseDay courseDay)
        Set the day of the week the course takes place on
        Parameters:
        courseDay - the day the course takes place

      • getCourseDay

        CourseDay getCourseDay()
        method to determine the day the course takes place on.
        Returns:
        The day the course takes place.

      • setCourseStartTime

        void setCourseStartTime(int time)
        method to set the time a course takes place. The course must start between 8 and 20. No numbers larger or smaller should be accepted
        Parameters:
        time - the hour the course takes place at. This number must be in the range of 8-20.

      • getCourseStartTime

        int getCourseStartTime()
        Method to return the start time of the course
        Returns:
        the start time of the course as a number of hours after midnight.

      • setLectureLength

        void setLectureLength(int lectureLength)
        Method to set the length of lecture. This length must be greater than 0 and less than 4
        Parameters:
        lectureLength - the length of the lecture in hours.

      • getLectureLength

        int getLectureLength()
        Method to return the length of the lecture
        Returns:
        the length of the lecture
